name: Service and Research Foundation of Asia on Family and Culture
briefDescription: SERFAC is an India based autonomous non governmental organisation with Special Consultative status with ECOSOC of the United Nations.The four major disciplines/avenues of work: 1. Research, 2.Institutional networking with Governments, United Nations, educational,health, environmental ,government agencies,corporate entities and NGO's,local ,national and international levels,Projects: Training in Skills for Livlihood for Women, Child Care Centre, Vocational Training for youth 3.Publications 4.Digitization of Archives which contain 40 years of pioneering work on Family,Women and Children. SERFAC is an excellent academic centre with library facilities, contemporary research on family ,sociology, and other vital areas of human and economic living through its child care centre, skills training and non formal education programmes and other areas of sustainability.SERFAC has organised 13 International and global conferences and has reached out to over 3000 stake holders from 98 countries through its various programmes.
